Assignments

The following page is speculation and commentary, not finalized ideas or plans.

These assignments will be done outside class. They will comprise a total 50% of the course grade.

  • Assignment 1—Creating an Amazon Web Services ID.
  • Assignment 2—Running a simple Python program
  • Assignment 3—Single instance computation on Cloud474.
  • Assignment 4—Cluster computation on Cloud474.
  • Assignment 5—Latency-controlling computation on Cloud474.
  • Assignment 6—Adding a key-value store
  • Assignment 7—Cluster-level infrastructure
  • Assignment 8—Trading off consistency, availability, and compensation
  • Assignment 9—Performance analysis of CAP tradeoffs
  • Assignment 10—Logging system performance
  • Assignment 11—Making the system robust
  • Assignment 12—Final report.
